name: Feline Fresh Non-Clumping Pine Pellet Cat Litter, Unscented, 20 lb Bag – Eco-Friendly, Odor Control, Biodegradable, Low Dust, Absorbent, Natural, Safe for Cats, Made in USA
short_description: Natural Pine Pellet Cat Litter: Made from 100% natural pine, this non-clumping cat litter offers superior odor control, while being safe, biodegradable, and environmentally friendly for a cleaner home and planet.

Unscented for Sensitive Cats: Feline Fresh unscented litter is ideal for cats with sensitive noses. It provides a natural odor control system without harsh chemicals or added fragrances, ensuring a gentle experience for your cat.

Absorbent & Low Dust: The pine pellets absorb moisture effectively, turning into sawdust to control odors. This low-dust formula is perfect for cats with respiratory sensitivities and ensures a cleaner environment.
Eco-Friendly & Biodegradable: This litter is 100% biodegradable and can be safely composted, providing an environmentally responsible choice that reduces waste and supports sustainability.

Easy to Clean & Safe: Feline Fresh litter is safe for both your cat and the environment. It clumps slightly when wet and is easy to scoop, making maintenance quick and efficient for a cleaner litter box.
product_description: Feline Fresh Non-Clumping Natural Pine Pellet Cat Litter is an eco-friendly, unscented, and highly absorbent litter made from 100% natural pine. Ideal for cats with sensitivities to fragrances, this litter eliminates odors naturally without the use of harsh chemicals or artificial fragrances. The pine pellets are highly absorbent, absorbing moisture and turning into sawdust to control odors and minimize tracking. Its low-dust formula is perfect for cats with respiratory sensitivities, and it's safe for both your cat and the environment. Unlike traditional clay litters, Feline Fresh is 100% biodegradable and compostable, providing a sustainable and environmentally responsible alternative. Whether you have one cat or multiple, this litter offers superior performance while being kind to the planet. Made in the USA, this 20 lb bag of Feline Fresh Natural Pine Pellet Cat Litter is a perfect choice for pet owners looking to provide the best for their cats while keeping their home fresh and clean.
product_details: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H 18 x 12 x 7 inches

Directions Pour Feline Fresh into a litter box covering bottom with one inch of product. If more than one cat uses the litter box, don’t add extra Feline Fresh, simply change the litter more often. Scoop out and flush solid waste daily. Stir litter box to rejuvenate and redistribute the fresh pine scent of Feline Fresh. Empty, clean and refill litter box when all pine pellets have dissolved. Feline Fresh can be discarded into the compost pile or used as mulch.
Model Name Non-Clumping Natural Pine Pellet Cat Litter
Specific Uses for Product Odor Control, Litter Box, Cat Waste Management

name: ökocat Original Wood Clumping Cat Litter, Unscented, 18.8 pounds - Natural Ingredients, Stops Odor, Clumps Solid, 99% Dust Free, Great for All Cats
short_description: UNSCENTED NATURAL CAT LITTER: okocat next-generation, plant-based, premium wood clumping cat litter is relentless at controlling odors while being exceptionally absorbent and naturally lightweight for added convenience and cleanliness
EXCEPTIONAL ODOR CONTROL: okocat unscented cat litter wood fiber naturally prevents enzymes from bonding with liquid & waste to stop the creation of ammonia & odor.
QUICK CLUMPING FOR EASY SCOOPING: okocat's precision cut wood fiber absorbs liquid on contact, forming solid, easy-to-scoop clumps that make cleaning the litter box quick and easy.

99% DUST FREE FOR A HEALTHIER HOME: Clean wood fiber is screened & de-dusted for a cleaner pour. okocat natural cat litter has NO dirty clay dust. NO artificial fragrance, harmful chemicals, or toxic dyes. Biodegradable & compostable. It's better for you, your cat and home, and the planet.
LITTER THAT LASTS LONGER: Use less, spend less, waste less. Long-lasting absorbency means fewer bags, less waste, and a lighter footprint—without compromising performance.
product_description: Switch to a superior natural cat litter that's cleaner and healthier for your feline, family, and home. Our next-generation kitty litter is made entirely from sustainably sourced, responsibly rescued natural wood fiber that has never been treated. Free from harmful chemicals, synthetic dyes, and artificial fragrance, ökocat litter boasts outstanding plant-based odor control. Best of all, our biodegradable clumping formula using a plant-based clumping agent, is free from powdery clay dust and compostable for added convenience and cleanliness. oko is German for "eco" or ecological, meaning green or organic. okocat litter is made from 100% reclaimed wood that comes from the earth and can be returned to the earth. The 100% recyclable paper bag packaging with a convenient strong, paper handle is easy to carry, store, pour, break down and recycle.
product_details: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H 20 x 12.5 x 9 inches
Item Dimensions LxWxH 20 x 12.5 x 9 inches

Directions To transition your cat, first fill half of your litter box with okocat and top off with your current litter. When it's time to clean the box entirely, use more okocat and less of your current litter on top. Finally, fill box entirely with okocat once your cat is comfortable.

name: Dr. Elsey's Ultra Unscented Clumping Clay Cat Litter 18 lb Bag
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY: A combination of premium texture and granule size made with 100% bentonite clay for maximum clumping creates litter particles that are just the right size.
LOW DUST: Ideal for cats and owners who suffer from allergies with a 99.9% dust-free and hypoallergenic litter formulation.
HARD CLUMPING: Hard clumping medium grain clay helps prevent moisture from reaching the bottom of the tray and forms hard clumps that won't break down, making it easier to scoop.
SUPERIOR ODOR CONTROL: Formulated for single or multi-cat households with natural ingredients to keep your home smelling clean and fresh between litter box cleanings.
LOW TRACKING: A unique formulation of medium grain clay helps keep litter in the box where it belongs.
product_description: Dr. Elsey's Ultra Clumping Cat Litter is a unique formulation that combines the heavy non-tracking granules of classic with a medium-grain clay. The result is an excellent clumping litter that prevents moisture from reaching the bottom of the tray while providing a clump that will not break down. This cat litter is perfect for multi-cat households and those cat parents with sifting or mechanical litter boxes. With its superior odor control, you can be sure your home will always smell fresh and clean.
product_details: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H 15.91 x 11.97 x 3.85 inches
Item Dimensions LxWxH 15 x 10 x 4 inches

Directions Fill clean, dry litter box with 3" to 4" of Dr. Elsey's litter. Scoop waste twice daily and refill box as necessary. Replace entire box once a month. Dispose of used litter in trash. DO NOT FLUSH.
Warranty Description Guaranteed litter box use
Age Range Description All Life Stages

Care Instructions Always wash your hands thoroughly after handling used cat litter, as cat feces may contain Toxoplasma gondii—a parasite that can cause toxoplasmosis. Pregnant or nursing women, as well as children and anyone with a weakened immune system, should avoid handling used cat litter. Always handle litter in a ventilated area to avoid inhalation. Keep contents and packaging out of reach of children and pets. Seek medical help in case of accidental ingestion.
Specific Uses for Product Behavior, Indoor, Urinary

name: Catit - Go Natural Pea Husk Clumping Cat Litter - Dust Free, Easy Cleaning & Scooping, Flushable Kitty Litter with Odor Control & Subtle Fragrance - 12.3 Lbs, Vanilla Scented
short_description: Tight Clumping - Catit Go Natural Pea Husk Litter is a strong clumping cat litter for easy and dust-free litter box management. Catit’s litter composition decomposes naturally and can be safely flushed down the toilet, reducing waste and minimizing impact

Gentle On Paws - Made from 100% natural pea husks, this litter is gentle on your cat's paws and effective at controlling odors. Designed to minimize tracking around your home while offering a soft and gentle texture that's comfortable for your cat's sensitive paws, promoting a happy and stress-free litter box experience

Convenient Packaging - This pack includes 12.3 lbs of natural cat litter, providing plenty of coverage for multiple cats or a single cat over an extended period of time. The packaging may vary but the quality remains consistent

Dust Free – Cat litter dust may trigger allergic reactions in both cats and humans. Catit’s Pea Husk Cat Litter is 99% dust free. With exceptionally low dust, this litter is ideal for those with sensitive noses and eyes. As your kitty burrows, even the smallest pieces settle at the bottom, which helps to curb airborne dust

No Harmful Chemicals or Additives - Rest assured that you are using a safe and natural product for your beloved feline companion. Catit Go Natural Pea Husk Clumping Cat Litter contains no artificial fragrances, dyes, or harsh chemicals that could harm your pet's health
product_description: Catit Go Natural Pea Husk Clumping Cat Litter is the ideal solution for keeping your home clean and fresh while providing your feline friend with a natural litter option. This 14.8 lb pack is designed to meet the needs of cat owners who are looking for a cleaner and more eco-friendly alternative to traditional clay litter. This versatile litter is suitable for all types of cats and all sizes of litter boxes, including those with lids or tops. It provides a comfortable experience for your furry friend while keeping your home smelling fresh. With its innovative pea husk formula, this clumping cat litter effectively absorbs moisture and locks in odors, making it ideal for multiple cats or larger litter boxes. Its design also helps minimize tracking so you can enjoy a mess-free environment while your furry companion enjoys their comfortable bathroom experience. Plus, the added lid feature provides extra privacy for cats who prefer it during their business time. Keep things easy and natural with Catit Go Natural Pea Husk Clumping Cat Litter - because both you and your beloved pet deserve nothing less than the best!

name: Progressive Planet Wundercat Natural Pine Cat Litter, 20lbs (Pack of 2) - 100% Reclaimed Wood Pellets for Superior Absorption & Odor Control - Low-Tracking & Biodegradable - No Synthetic Perfumes
short_description: 100% Natural & Eco-Friendly: You will receive 2 bags (20 pounds each), made from 100% reclaimed wood, Wundercat Pine Litter is a biodegradable, compostable, and lightweight alternative to clay litter, with no virgin timber harvested.
3x More Absorbent Than Clay Litter: Instantly traps moisture, reducing the frequency of litter changes while keeping your cat’s litter box clean, dry, and fresh.
Powerful Natural Odor Control: Helps reduce odors and ammonia using the natural properties of pine - no synthetic perfumes or harsh chemicals, just pure freshness.
Easy Cleanup with Soft Pine Pellets: Cracked pine pellets break down into sawdust when wet, locking in odors and making scooping and cleaning effortless.

Low-Tracking for a Cleaner Home: Formulated to minimize dust and tracking, Wundercat helps maintain cleaner air, floors, and litter areas, making it ideal for multi-cat households and sensitive cats & owners.
product_description: Wundercat Natural Pine Cat Litter is the eco-friendly alternative to clay-based litter, offering superior absorption, odor control, and sustainability for a cleaner, fresher home. Made from 100% reclaimed wood, this biodegradable and compostable litter is gentle on the environment while providing powerful moisture and odor absorption for your cat’s litter box. With 3x the absorbency of clay, Wundercat instantly traps moisture and odors, neutralizing ammonia without the need for synthetic perfumes or chemicals. The soft, cracked pine pellets break down into sawdust when wet, locking in odors and making cleanup fast and hassle-free. Designed with low-tracking properties, this natural litter helps maintain cleaner air and floors, making it a great choice for multi-cat households and allergy-sensitive cats and owners. Plus, it’s lightweight and easy to handle, so you can transport, pour, and change litter effortlessly.
